name: AvRtos
short_description:
AvRtos is a small, preemtive, priority based real time operating system for Atmel AVR microcontrollers.
It was written in C.
AvRtos provides message queues and semaphores for task synchronization. It uses a static memory allocation scheme.
AvRtos is nearly the smallest RTOS out there. Even pico]OS is much bigger.

AvRtos can be compiled using WinAVR. There is a AvrStudio 4 project file to get the example code working very quickly.
summary: Small real time operating system for AVR microcontrollers
